msg: [UIMA-837] shorten the form of the version used in the running footer, for versions ending in -SNAPSHOT or -incubating-SNAPSHOT by stripping these suffixes off.

msg: CAMEL-346 : Exception handler doesn't swallow exceptions anymore

msg: PIG-125: Improve exception handling in cases when an attempt is made to access a field as a tuple, and it turns out not to be a tuple.
